alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:16PM EDT until July 02 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harrison County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Meade County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Jefferson County in central Kentucky... North central Hardin County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... West central Bullitt County in central Kentucky... * Until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/. * At 216 PM EDT/116 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Brandenburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brandenburg, Valley Station, Irvington, Muldraugh, West Point, Elizabeth, Ekron, Mauckport, Laconia and Guston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
